 EVERYTHING ELSE   You might find the following helpful 
 Checking registration 
 Always check the registration of any person or business trying to sell you an investment or give you investment advice 
 OSC in the Community 
 OSC in the Community is an outreach program which takes the OSC's regulatory mandate from Bay Street to Main Street. 
 Investor News sign-up 
 Stay informed about the latest investor initiatives, educational resources, topical issues, key dates and investor warnings and alerts. 
 Binary options 
 No company is authorized to sell binary options in Canada. Learn more about how to protect yourself. 
 Questions or concerns? 
 Questions about investing, working with advisors or fraud? Our experts can provide information to help you invest wisely and confidently. 
 Behavioural insights 
 Behavioural insights recognize how people actually behave versus traditional economic and market theory of people as rational actors. 
 Research and reports 
 Learn what we’ve found about the habits and needs of Canadians related to personal finance, money management and investing. 
 Cryptocurrency offerings 
 Investors may be eager to get in on a new trend, but should be wary of the considerable risks that often accompany these investments. 
 Investing in the marijuana industry 
 Investing in a marijuana company can come with a number of risks that investors should also be aware of.
